extendedInfo.description: Your baby cries a lot or delayed sleep? You can put a nice sound to calm your baby and sleep like an angel.  A beautiful song that will really calm your baby.Lullabies are sung by mothers around the world for their children fall asleep.â Great quality of the sound â Absolutely Relaxing!â The best relaxing sound!A lullaby is a soothing song, usually sung to young children before they go to sleep, with the intention of speeding that process. As a result they are often simple and repetitive. Lullabies can be found in every culture and since the ancient period.Typically a lullaby is in triple metre, or in a compound metre like 6/8. Tonally, most lullabies are simple, often merely alternating tonic and dominant harmonies: Because the intended effect is to put someone to sleep, wild chromaticism would be somewhat out of character.All persons are invited to help promote this application for (friends, colleagues, mother, father, grandmother, grandfather, brother, sister). For those who want to help indicate this application follows some examples of media (email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, MSN, YouTube, radio, TV, newspaper, book, magazine, Internet)Keywords: babies, children, preschool, children, sound effects, sounds, kids, alphabet for kids, preschool, sleep, baby,  music for babies, Happy Baby

reviews.title: Best app ever!
reviews.comment: I love love live this app. My 5 month old and my 20 month old both fall asleep in minutes when I play it. It has also helped me fall asleep on occassion as well and I don\'t usually like to have any type of noise when I sleep. It is very soothing. Great job!
reviews.author: NiTara Whitehead

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy reverb
reviews.comment: This is great. I deliver in october and he loves song two at night. I actually get to sleep. But please fix it to where if the screen locks or turns off it doesnt shurt off 5mins later???? I set it for 50mins and i normally only get 14-20 mins of music.
reviews.author: Sami Martinez

reviews.title: Life Saver
reviews.comment: We were on vacation with the family, we forgot our 7 month sound player. Cryin, fussy we downloaded, played #2 and minutes fell asleep. Thank you!
reviews.author: Karlos Benavides

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I have used this since my breast fed baby boy was 6 weeks old he is now over 1 and loves it! Its great for establishing a routine as soon as he hears the music he knows it is time to sleep. We put it on loudest after his bath and it gets quiter with each task such as book and feed then bed and it is left on quietly until he is asleep . I have this downloaded onto tablet, husbands phone mums phone and my phone to ensure my son has this to enjoy wherever he is! Thanks
reviews.author: Ashlea Fyffe

reviews.title: Nanap
reviews.comment: This is superb thankyou for your time doing this not only for parents babies. But us grandparents who fall asleep listening and watching over our precious grangchildren drop off to sleep with the help of your music.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ctarrj18
reviews.comment: I love it. It really helps for a baby that\'s already tired and just needs something calming and soothing. My little one falls out to this app and a bottle.
reviews.author: Ctarr Johnson

reviews.title: I like the app...
reviews.comment: I like this app very much 9 times out of 10 puts my baby to sleep. Do not like that I set it for 50 min and it only plays for 10! And that there are only 3 song choices.
reviews.author: Tanya Haygood

reviews.title: Good baby music app
reviews.comment: Great app calms my little one right down. Just wish it had more song choices.
reviews.author: Heather Beauchamp

reviews.title: OMG, MY BABY WAS BUGGIN OUT, and then....
reviews.comment: Just discovered thiss app, using it in a time of need and IT WORKED!!!!!!! Baby is sleeping and ive got my sanity back!! Thank you! 8 )  I will be using it at least twice daily!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Esta genial para los bebes, los relaja , los calma y nos pone a dormir tambien.... Genial,,,,...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Im 17 years old and Music 3 brings me back to when i was 3. Amazing how fast i get to sleep. Love this app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love love love this app!!
reviews.comment: My 3, 2 and 1 yr old girls fall asleep when I play song #3. Also your other apps put them to sleep. Thank you!!
reviews.author: Leps Mafua

reviews.title: Freeezes
reviews.comment: It only plays 3 songs :/ thats it and it wont stop playing even.after I pushed stop
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lullaby for babies 2
reviews.comment: The one with kenny G is the best one on here. Totally recommend this for babies that won\'t go to sleep.
reviews.author: Michelle Ault

reviews.comment: Awesome app for traveling with a little one! I especially love the timer feature.
reviews.author: danielle babbitt

reviews.comment: The best apparently I\'ve ever downloaded! Definitely helps at 3:30 in the morning :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovely music but it crashes
reviews.comment: my baby loves this but just as shes about to settle it crashes. If it wasnt for this it would be perfect. the music is lovely.....wow!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app my 18 month old loves it , helps her calm down right before bedtime\tGreat app!!!
reviews.author: Chris Cope

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Will turn off randomly... not worth the time.
reviews.author: Maria Romero

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: #3relaxes my little one so much. I just wish there were more than 3 song choices. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User
